metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10906 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Pallets Jinja before 2.10.1, str.format_map allows a sandbox escape.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10906` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-jinja2 - 2.8-1ubuntu0.1
python3-jinja2 - 2.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jinja2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8-1ubuntu0.1').
